trans-unit.source: Represents user login information for forms authentication by using client application services.
The ClientFormsAuthenticationCredentials class is used by the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider> interface.

When you implement this interface, you must return a populated instance of this class in your <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A> implementation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationCredentials"></xref> class.
You will typically pass user-provided values as the parameters of this constructor.
The user name.
The user password.
A value indicating whether the user credentials should be saved and reused for subsequent login attempts.
Gets or sets the user password.
The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> class uses this property to retrieve the user password during authentication.
You will not typically use this property in your application code.
Instead, you will use the class constructor to set the user password.
The user password.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user credentials should be saved and reused for subsequent login attempts.
The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> class uses this property during authentication.
You will not typically use this property in your application code.
Instead, you will specify a `rememberMe` parameter value in the class constructor.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the credentials should be saved and reused; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the user name.
The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> class uses this property to retrieve the user name during authentication.
You will not typically use this property in your application code.
Instead, you will use the class constructor to set the user name.
The user name.
